title: Sticky Global Navigation Visibility and Functionality on Desktop
description: Verify that the global navigation header remains sticky and visible at the top during page scroll on desktop browsers, and all navigation links function correctly.

steps.description: Open the website homepage on a desktop browser.
Scroll down the page slowly.
Confirm the global navigation header remains fixed at the top of the viewport during scrolling.
Click each navigation link on the global header.
Verify that each link navigates to the correct section or page as expected.

title: Sticky Global Navigation Visibility and Burger Menu on Mobile
description: Verify that the global navigation header is sticky, the burger menu is visible and functional on mobile viewports, and all navigation options work correctly.

steps.description: Open the website homepage on a mobile device or emulator with small screen size.
Scroll down the page.
Confirm the global navigation header remains sticky and visible at the top during scrolling.
Verify the burger menu icon is visible on the global navigation header.
Tap the burger menu icon.
Confirm the navigation menu expands and displays all navigation links correctly.
Tap each navigation option.
Verify that each navigation option links to the appropriate page or section.

title: Testimonial Slider Auto-play and Loop Functionality
description: Verify that the testimonial slider auto-plays smoothly, loops infinitely, and displays correct patient feedback with author images.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage where the testimonial slider is displayed.
Check the first testimonial text and author image are displayed correctly.
Observe the slider for at least two full cycles or the equivalent display time of multiple testimonials.
Confirm the slider automatically advances slides smoothly without user interaction.
Verify the slider loops infinitely, returning to the first testimonial after the last.
Check that author images correspond correctly to the testimonial text displayed.

title: Appointment Booking Form Validation with All Valid Inputs
description: Verify that submitting the appointment booking form with valid data displays a successful confirmation message.

steps.description: Navigate to the appointment booking page or open the embedded appointment form on the homepage.
Fill in all required form fields with valid information (name, contact info, date, time, healthcare service, specialist if applicable).
Submit the appointment booking form.
Verify that client-side validation passes without errors.
Check that the user receives a clear, user-friendly confirmation message indicating successful submission.

title: Appointment Booking Form Validation with Missing Required Fields
description: Verify client-side validation prevents submission when required fields are missing, and appropriate error messages are shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the appointment booking page or open the embedded appointment form.
Partially fill the form leaving one or more required fields empty (e.g., no name or date).
Attempt to submit the appointment booking form.
Confirm form submission is blocked.
Verify clear and specific validation error messages appear next to each missing or invalid required field.

title: Appointment Booking Form Validation with Invalid Input Formats
description: Verify that client-side validation flags invalid inputs such as incorrect email or phone formats and prevents submission.

steps.description: Open the appointment booking form.
Enter invalid formats into fields (e.g., invalid email format, wrong phone number format).
Attempt to submit the form.
Check that the form blocks submission.
Verify the display of appropriate error messages indicating the invalid input format.

title: Service Information Pages Content Accuracy and Display
description: Verify that service information pages display comprehensive and accurate details about healthcare services, categories, and specialists.

steps.description: Navigate to the service information page from the global navigation.
Verify presence of all listed healthcare service categories.
Check that each category displays correct specialists relevant to that service.
Confirm the accuracy of service descriptions and details consistent with clinic records.

title: Location Directory Display and Information Accuracy
description: Verify that the locations page displays correct information for Kerugoya and Ishiara clinic branches, including contact info and operation hours.

steps.description: Navigate to the locations page via global navigation.
Confirm both Kerugoya and Ishiara locations are listed.
Verify the displayed contact information matches the clinic records.
Check that operation hours are displayed correctly and completely for both locations.

title: Scroll-triggered Reveal Animations Functionality and Performance
description: Validate that scroll-triggered animations reveal UI elements smoothly without layout shifts or significant performance degradation.

steps.description: Load the homepage and start scrolling slowly down the page.
Observe that content sections and cards reveal themselves as they enter the viewport.
Confirm that no sudden layout shifts occur when animations trigger.
Verify smooth animation without jank or noticeable performance issues.

title: UI Components Neubomorphic Style Compliance and Accessibility
description: Verify that all UI components such as buttons, cards, input fields, and modals adhere to the neumorphic style guidelines and accessibility standards including contrast, focus states, and motion preferences.

steps.description: Navigate through multiple pages including homepage, appointment, and service pages.
Verify that all buttons and interactive elements follow neumorphic styling including shadows and highlights as per design system.
Check all text and background contrasts meet accessibility guidelines.
Tab through focusable elements and observe visible and clear focus states.
Confirm that focus states are consistent and meet accessibility standards.
Enable system-level motion reduction preferences.
Verify animations are reduced or disabled appropriately for users with motion preferences.

title: Responsive Behavior Verification Across Devices
description: Ensure the website layout and features adapt properly and remain fully functional on a variety of screen sizes including desktop, tablet, and mobile.

steps.description: Open the website on devices or simulators representing desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes.
Verify that all key UI elements including navigation, forms, sliders, and content are displayed and usable without overflow or layout breaks.
Confirm that the sticky header and burger menu behave correctly and remain accessible across all screen sizes.
Check that interactive elements and text are sized appropriately for touch on smaller devices.
